contexts.context: ...shopkeepers anywhere, no matter their open-mindedness, who <mark>aren't</mark> alerted when a Khajiit or a Bosmer enters their shop....
...heard of you,” said the old vagabond, very impressed. <mark>“Aren't</mark> you the adventurer who slew all those ash vampires in Ghostgate...
...said Lledos with a sigh. "My dear friends, we <mark>aren't</mark> mugging some Nord tourist fresh off the ferry. The Cobblers...
